txt.en: If you would like to skip the remainder of the introductory tutorial experience and be transported to Archet following the burning of the town, speak with Celandine Brandybuck.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest must be completed before the introduction is complete.</rgb>

If you choose to skip the introductory tutorial experience, you will be transported to Archet after it has been burned and will be unable to travel to Archet prior to those events.\n\nAre you sure you want to continue?

If you choose to skip the introductory tutorial experience, you will be transported to Archet after it has been burned and will be unable to travel to Archet prior to those events.\n\nAre you sure you want to continue?
Allows you to skip directly through all newbie experiences into the main portion of the game.
Talk to Celandine Brandybuck to skip the Introduction
If you would like to skip the remainder of the introductory tutorial experience and be transported to Archet following the burning of the town, speak with Celandine Brandybuck.
<rgb=#FF0000>This quest must be completed before the introduction is complete</rgb>
